data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Colloff, Matthew J. (2011): A review of the oribatid mite family Nothridae in Australia, with new species of Novonothrus and Trichonothrus from rain forest and their Gondwanan biogeographical affinities (Acari: Oribatida). Zootaxa 3005: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204042
